lines.text: With your looks you shouldn't have any trouble finding a job.
Thank you, but I'd rather be employed for my brain.
When a man outlives his usefulness, he ought to jump out a window.
Oh, I saved a couple out of the crash.
There's no room for sympathy or softness - my code is smash or be smashed!
She's blackmailing me! I'm caught like a rat in a trap! I'll be ruined! Franklin Monroe might hear of it! Anderson, you know all about women. What am I to do?
There's nothing like a nice snappy game of chess to get you down.
Oh, it's you. I didn't know you with all your clothes on.
